title: 歐盟外交政策與安全事務高級代表、歐盟委員會副主席費德麗卡 · 莫蓋里尼發表關於桂民海在中國被持續拘留的聲明

replies.msg:
歐洲聯盟高度重視歐盟公民桂民海在中國被持續拘留一事。今年一月，桂先生被捕，儘管中國政府一再保證他的人身自由在當時不受限制。中國的行為違反了領事支持的國際規則，引發外界對中國的法治實施，包括禁止任意剝奪自由，提出了嚴重質疑。歐盟完全支持瑞典政府在這一事件上所做的努力。我們期待中國政府允許桂先生與瑞典外交和醫務人員見面，將他釋放，讓他能與女兒和家人團聚。

Statement by High Representative/Vice-President Federica Mogherini on the continued detention of Gui Minhai in China

The European Union takes the continued detention in China of Gui Minhai, a citizen of an EU country, very seriously. His arrest in January took place despite repeated assurances by the Chinese authorities that Mr Gui was free at that time. China's actions are in breach of international rules on consular support and raise serious questions about China's application of the rule of law, including the prohibition of arbitrary deprivation of liberty. The EU fully supports the efforts of the Swedish government in this case. We expect the Chinese authorities to allow Mr Gui to meet Swedish diplomatic and medical staff, and to release him so that he can be reunited with his daughter and family.​
